detail_desc: Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Sleeveless blouse in softly draping satin with a V-shaped opening at the front and ties at the neckline. Gathered seam at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Fine-knit socks in soft cotton with a ribbed shaft.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a print motif, rounded collar and concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined. Comes with a wand and pointed jersey hat with a print motif. Lined.
Polo-neck collar in a soft cable knit. Fleece lining.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, long, wide raglan sleeves with shaping seams, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Narrow metal Alice band with faceted sparkly stones on top.
Cat eye sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a V-neck and gently rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a fluffy finish. Motif on the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, organic cotton waffle jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with decorative buttons, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Denim jeans with a high waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with smocking at the top, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Overlocked edges at the top and sleeves. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Short, off-the-shoulder, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Calf-length trousers in woven fabric with side pockets, fake back pockets and a concealed zip in the side. Wide, straight legs with a seam at the hem and a slit and lacing at the sides.
Nursing poncho in a soft fine knit containing some wool. Open at one side for easier nursing access.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a rib-knit stand-up collar and wide raglan sleeves with foldover ribbing at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and straight, wide legs with pleats at the top and creases down the front.
Short, high-waisted jersey shorts in a cotton and modal blend with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a fine rib knit with a deep neckline front and back and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Pyjamas in soft jersey. Top with a wrapover front, short sleeves and gathers at the side for best fit over the tummy. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Can be worn both during pregnancy and while nursing afterwards. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Chinos in soft, slightly stretchy cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool decorated with faceted, plastic sparkly stones on the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

All-in-one suit in printed, organic cotton jersey containing some viscose. Jersey-lined hood, long raglan sleeves and a concealed zip in the side. Press-studs at the top, a print motif and kangaroo pocket on the front and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Collar, buttons at the top, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 35x170 cm.
Cropped vest top in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the back and lace trim at the hem.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a ribbed trim.

Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey with a V-neck, wrapover at the top, decorative gathers along the shoulder seams and a gathered seam at the waist. Long sleeves and cuffs with metal buttons. Unlined.
Skirt in patterned chiffon with wide smocking at the waist and two tiers. Partly lined.

Waist bag in grained imitation leather. The bag is divided into two main compartments with a zip at the top and one zipped outer compartment. Adjustable waist strap. Cotton twill lining. Size approx. 3x12x20 cm.
Short, straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and slightly wider, gently tapered legs with creases.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straw hat with a narrow imitation suede band. Width of brim 12 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an appliquéd chest pocket.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend with a burnout pattern and raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length, sleeveless dress woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise, a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist, and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, pearly buttons at the front, flap front pockets and a gently tapered waist. Lined.
Short-sleeved, knee-length dress in stretch jersey crêpe with a wrapover V-neck, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Set with a top and leggings in printed cotton jersey. Top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in stretch washed denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leggings in stretch denim made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with buttons at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Velour body with a wide flounce at the top and detachable, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined crotch with press-studs.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Loafers in imitation suede with a moccasin seam at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. The shoes are partly made from recycled polyester.
Large thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 9.5 cm.

Pyjama set with a long-sleeved top, a short-sleeved top and bottoms in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with a ribbed neckline and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and narrow ties at the sides.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Warm-lined, waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather. Padded top edge, a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in narrow-wale corduroy with adjustable straps, a gathered seam at the waist and elastication at the sides. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey.
Large, elasticated scrunchie.
T-shirt in supersoft jersey made from a viscose blend with a photographic print on the front.
Narrow imitation leather belts in different designs with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
V-neck blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a round hem and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Padded jacket in a nylon weave with a fleece-lined stand-up collar and a detachable hood with an elastic drawstring. Zip with a chin guard and wind flap with concealed hook and loop fastening down the front. Zipped side pockets, a flap sleeve pocket and an inner pocket. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant. Length 56 cm, 61 cm and 70 cm.
Long cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with front pockets, a detachable belt in braided imitation suede, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
